summary: Hassan, a brilliant aviation engineer struggles with loneliness and depression while trying to design his exceptional project.
cast: Ahmed Helmy|Menna Shalabi|Mahmoud Hemida|Dalal Abdulaziz|Sami Meghawri|Amr Mamdouh|Ahmed Fouad Selim|Mohamed El Saadany|Youssef Eid|Mohamed Sharaf|Raouf Mustafa|Hani El-Sabbagh
title: Aasef ala el-iz'ag
